title: How to Enhance Algo Trading Win Rate with ML - Part 3: Training
author: Mehdi
summary: In this third part, we train our machine learning model using TensorFlow and Keras to improve an SMA crossover strategy's win rate. Learn how to preprocess features, tune parameters, and evaluate model accuracy for algorithmic trading.
